パッケージ org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint

  • インタフェースのサマリー 
    インタフェース 説明
    PaintSession
    Manages an interactive paint session.
    PaintTool  
  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    AirbrushTool
    An airbrush tool.
    BasicPaintSession  
    ContainerFigure
    Container for Figure objects with stacking preview mechanism.
    ContinuousPaintSession
    The superclass for paint tools that draw continuously along the path traced by the mouse's movement while the button is depressed
    DragPaintSession
    The superclass for paint tools that use click-drag-release motions to draw objects.
    EllipseFigure
    2D Ellipse object
    EllipseTool
    A drawing tool.
    Figure
    Superinterface for all drawing objects.
    FigureDrawContext  
    LineFigure
    2D Line object
    LineTool
    A line drawing tool
    PaintExample  
    PaintSurface
    Manages a simple drawing surface.
    PencilTool
    A pencil tool.
    PointFigure
    2D Point object
    PolyLineTool
    A polyline drawing tool.
    RectangleFigure
    2D Rectangle object
    RectangleTool
    A drawing tool.
    RoundedRectangleFigure
    2D Rectangle object
    RoundedRectangleTool
    A drawing tool.
    SegmentedPaintSession
    The superclass for paint tools that contruct objects from individually picked segments.
    SolidEllipseFigure
    2D Solid Ellipse object
    SolidPolygonFigure
    2D Line object
    SolidRectangleFigure
    2D SolidRectangle object
    SolidRoundedRectangleFigure
    2D SolidRectangle object
    TextFigure
    2D Rectangle object
    TextTool
    A text drawing tool.
    Tool  
    ToolSettings
    Tool Settings objects group tool-related configuration information.
